original_text: Howbeit they looked when he should have swollen, or fallen down dead suddenly: but after they had looked a great while, and saw no harm come to him, they changed their minds, and said that he was a god.
korean_text: 그들은 그가 붓든지 혹은 갑자기 쓰러져 죽을 줄로 기다렸다가 오래 기다려도 그에게 아무 이상이 없음을 보고 돌이켜 생각하여 말하되 그를 신이라 하더라

sentences.original_text: Howbeit they looked when he should have swollen
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 그가 부어 오를 때를 보고 있었으니

sentences.original_text: but after they had looked a great while
and saw no harm come to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 아무 해가 없는 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: and said that he was a god
